title: Game is not loading after champ select
body: I can log onto league fine, the chat works everything, but when i go to play a game after champ select my game keeps crashing and says i need to check my internet connection. and it is nothing to do with my internet connection, also when i exit the game and reconnect sometimes i get in the game but it may be late and as you know there is a penalty for being afk for 5 minutes so i basically pay that penalty often and it is beginning to be annoying waiting 20 minutes to find a game :( for 5 games, PLEASE!!!!! can anyone help me? (and i already tried disabling my antivirus and such) Riot honestly need to fix this asap.

replies.body:
Because servers for different games/services are located in different physical locations, it's completely possible to have a good connection to one game/service but not another. From your description, it definitely sounds like you're experiencing an unstable connection to the server which is what's preventing you from connecting. The guide that *Rineyy* linked is our connection guide, which addresses your issue's most common solutions.

If you continue to have issues connecting to games after working through those steps, please let me know.

This is likely due to unstable connection with the LoL servers (even if everything else works fine).

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
